original_text: And Jehoash king of Judah took all the hallowed things that Jehoshaphat, and Jehoram, and Ahaziah, his fathers, kings of Judah, had dedicated, and his own hallowed things, and all the gold that was found in the treasures of the house of the Lord, and in the king's house, and sent it to Hazael king of Syria: and he went away from Jerusalem.
korean_text: 유다의 왕 요아스가 그의 조상들 유다 왕 여호사밧과 여호람과 아하시야가 구별하여 드린 모든 성물과 자기가 구별하여 드린 성물과 여호와의 성전 곳간과 왕궁에 있는 금을 다 가져다가 아람 왕 하사엘에게 보냈더니 하사엘이 예루살렘에서 떠나갔더라

sentences.original_text: that Jehoshaphat, and Jehoram, and Ahaziah, his fathers, kings of Judah, had dedicated
sentences.korean_translation: 그 조상들 유다 왕들이었던 여호사밧과 여호람과 아하시야가 구별한

sentences.original_text: and all the gold that was found in the treasures of the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호와의 집의 보물 창고에서 발견된 모든 금을

sentences.original_text: and sent it to Hazael king of Syria:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 시리아 왕 하사엘에게 보내니

sentences.original_text: and he went away from Jerusalem.
